com.epoch.db

Class ForumRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.ForumRW

  • public final class ForumRW
extends DBCommon
    Handles database operations involving forums.

      • getPosts

        public static Map<ForumTopic,ArrayList<ForumPost>> getPosts(int courseId,
                                                            String searchExp)
                                                     throws DBException
        Gets all posts within topics that are in a course and that contain an expression.
        Parameters:
        courseId - course ID number
        searchExp - word fragment, word, phrase, simple boolean expression, or regular expression for which to search forum posts
        Returns:
        linked map of posts that contain the expression, keyed by topic; topics will be retrieved in reverse chronological order of their most recent posts
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • deleteTopicLinks

        static void deleteTopicLinks(Connection con,
                             int hwId,
                             List<Integer> exQIds)
                      throws SQLException
        Deletes links from a topic to an assignment and question when the question is no longer in the assignment; the topic remains in the forum.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        hwId - assignment ID number
        exQIds - ID numbers of questions no longer in the assignment; if null or empty, remove links to all questions in assignment
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database

                              ForumTopic[] topics)
                       throws DBException
        Finds out which topics in an array are being watched by a student, and sets a flag in each topic to indicate it.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        topics - array of topics
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading from the database

      • getWatcherTextMessageEmails

        public static String[] getWatcherTextMessageEmails(int topicId,
                                                   String postAuthorId)
                                            throws DBException
        Gets the email addresses to send texts to students watching this topic and TAs, instructors, and coinstructors of the topic's course, excluding the person who made the most recent post in the topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic's ID number
        postAuthorId - the author of the post
        Returns:
        array of email addresses for sending texts
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading from the database

        public static void setWatched(String userId,
                              int topicId,
                              boolean watch)
                       throws DBException
        Sets a topic to be watched or no longer to be watched by a user, if a student.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's login ID
        topicId - the ID of the topic to be watched or no longer watched
        watch - whether to start or stop watching the topic
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

                             int courseId,
                             List<String> studentIds,
                             boolean promote)
                      throws SQLException

        studentIds - login IDs of students who are being promoted to or demoted from TA
